issue_question: No Ik number coming up after syncing down
issue_answer:
1. Ensure you have data and your data connection is on

2. Try to browse on browser to ensure good connection to the internet

3. Sync up application data . Uinstall . Reinstall . Sync down and Refresh

1. Ik Number might not be assigned to you

2. Check withyour supervisor

issue_question: Why does it show me time out, No face?
issue_answer:
1. Scan facial template in bright area with good lightening.        

2. hold camera close to members face.and ensure camera capture

issue_question: Why is it showing No match?
issue_answer:
1. You may not be verifying the leader

2. Please confirm he/she is the leader and try again

3. Ensure you have proper lightening

issue_question: Why cant i proceed from verifying TGs leader face.
issue_answer: 1. Ensure you fill all details you are required to fill e.g age(age cannot be less than 18) and enter 11 Character phone number

issue_question: How do i renew an old member for an old TG
issue_answer: 1. You have to click on name to click RENEW and then update member phone number and crop type and location, note you can't update State and local government

issue_question: Why is the App crashing, when i try to add a third member
issue_answer:
1. Ensure you have space on your phone

2. Go to Phone settings > Open adavnced setting > Open Apps > Open TFM and click clear cache

issue_question: Why can't i change a members local goverment
issue_answer: 1. Members of a Tg can not belong to a local goverment different from their TG Leader

issue_question: Why didnt the capture button turn green
issue_answer:
1. Click on capture button and try again

2. scan face in a bright area, hold phone close to members face
1. If its the leaders role, you are trying to switch, you cant change a leaders role

issue_question: Why cant i delete the leader
issue_answer: 1. The leader of a TG cant be deleted

issue_question: How do i delete a member?
issue_answer:
1. Click on Members name

2. 3 options come up

3. Click delete and click yes

4. Member names moves to deleted members

issue_question: How can i add back a member deleted in error
issue_answer:
1. Click on deleted members at the top right corner of your App

2. Click on member name

3. Click Add to Group.

activity_group_id: Complete TFM for a trust group
issue_question: why has the TG status not turned green
issue_answer:
1. You have to have a minimum of 3 active persons and maximum of 5 whose status are green

2. Click done to finish TFM.

issue_question: How do i know if my work has synced?
issue_answer:
1. Go to statistics on App menu

2. check TFM synced and Last sync up time, it should be around the same time with the time you are syncing

issue_question: How do i stop my App from crashing?
issue_answer:
1. Create space on phone, delete unneccessary files

2. Close all other applications not in use

3. Restart phone
